feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a UI change to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer with extensive OKLCH theme variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML root mounting point loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating proposal flow, background, confetti, and final reveal card.
frontend/src/components/ConfettiBurst.ts: Canvas animation generating falling pastel confetti with physics simulation.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsBa: Generates 15 randomly animated floating heart elements as a decorative background.
Heart-shaped congratulatory card with layered shapes and animated decorative hearts.
Renders evasive No button and large glowing Yes button, triggering acceptance callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated/anonymous backend actors with React Query and identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveButton.ts: Hook computing randomized evasive button positions with pointer event handlers and bounds checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Full Internet Identity provider managing auth client creation, login flow, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, pastel theme color variables, dark-mode variants, global styling, and custom animations for floating hearts, glowing buttons, and heart-pop effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom oklch color variables, animations, typography/container plugins, and extended theming for the pastel UI.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata and feature definitions for a pastel 'Propose Day' landing page with floating hearts, evasive 'No' button, and celebratory reveal on 'Yes' click.
